评论概述: Quality Material & Stitching, Great Casual Look
评论详情: I've never been disappointed with the Anrabess brand. It is quality clothing at a reasonable price. This two-piece set is no exception. I'm 5-4, 140 lbs, with a curvy figure. The size small fit perfectly, although the waistband was a bit tight when pulling it on over my hips. However, once it was on, the waistband was comfortable. The sleeve length is a bit long, with the sleeve hitting above just where my thumb meets my palm, but I like that, especially when it's cold out. The inseam length is perfect -- no need to hem the pants. The pants also feature side pockets, and the top has a half zip that you can unzip all the way and show off a tanktop underneath, or zip all the way up for added warmth. I got it in Navy, but have now ordered a Medium in Black, just to compare. Perfect for running errands or a remote work day.
This set is really great quality and so comfortable! I’m 5ft 7in and 173lbs and got a large and it fits perfect and is a great length! Would definitely buy this in more colors!
This is so similar to the Spanx set (which I own so I know) but better because it has pockets! I’m 5’7” 160lbs and the medium is perfect. Pants length is great too!
Had to return it because a small was too big for my wife. Great quality. I would highly recommend.
Que producto tan bueno se lo he comprado a mi mamá y mi tía  donde se ponen la sudadera q es muy elegante y vestidora ya les he comprado de varios colores. Súper recomendada
Great for doing so many things I wear it all the time. The fabric is great thick. Well made. Color is fun a bright.
Soft Comfortable and the wide legs allow for sleek modern look. I loved the loose fit yet fits perfectly in all the right places.

At first glance it felt weird to see myself wearing this fit. But i gave it a another try and i style it the way the models do in the photos - this is key i also ordered a size up from my normal size for the extra baggage & style.
Did not like the color.
The sweatsuit itself is really well-made. It's soft and thick enough- not overly, but definitely not thin. I'm 5'3" and 134 lbs. The small fit fine but was a little shorter than I expected.
Great quality and so soft. Will be ordering another one. Petite friendly
Love the quality and comfort of this set!
Shirt is a little short. Fabric is thick but feels cold (synthetic). I prefer something cotton or fleece

I love the fabric and cut and everything about this set EXCEPT that the waist is too tight! I do not understand why the manufacturer would make the waist so small when it is elastic and has a drawstring for adjustment. Otherwise, the medium fits perfectly. I ordered a large to see if it would fit better, but it is too baggy overall (although the waist on the large fits more comfortably, it is still too snug for athleisure). Was hoping to wear these for travel, but the waist is a problem. For reference, I am 153 pounds and 5 ft 5 1/2 in tall. This set might be best for those with a tiny waist or those who have not had children.
Love everything about it. The fit the feel in general everything.

Love everything about this, I bought it for travel and it was great! One thing to note....they need to put pockets on the top! I'm constantly trying to put my hands in the pockets and there aren't any. There are pockets in the pants though! Still love it!
I LOVE THIS SO MUCH I AM BUYING ANOTHER IN A DIFFERENT COLOR. TRUE TO SIZE, GREAT QUALITY, AND IT LOOKS STYLISH.

While the fabric is a soft, smooth type, I've found that it stains easily and stains are somewhat difficult to remove.  After having and wearing the set a few times now, I wouldn't readily recommend it.  There are better sets out there.

评论概述: Very comfortable, great colors and price

They aren’t the same as the SPANX Air Essentials that I own but they are a close second, especially for the price.

This is a great dupe for the Spanx set! I have both. Here's the pros/cons of each. Spanx Pros-even softer, feels heavenly. Better fit for my body. I'm 5'4", 107 lbs and the Spanx XS fits perfectly, including the length of the pants.  Cons-no pockets, and the price.  This set pros-pockets, lower price. Cons-not quite as soft, but still fantastic! Pants are just a tad long on me. Not bad, but about an inch too long.  Overall, for the price difference, this set is a big winner!!!!  I ordered the same size and they're similar, with this set running a tad bigger overall.
These are the softest material ever with the exception of silk! Ultra comfortable. I ordered another pair in a different color!

I got this as a dupe for SPANXX. I find the price to be much better of course. I have used this a total of maybe 7 times - all for trips, both long and short haul.  The first 2 times, it was fantastic. The pants were as seen on the model. But after washing, the pants definitely shrunk and so now I have short a-line pants which is not the look I was going for at all.  That said, I wore this when pregnant and they were so comfortable and covered my bump. People could not even tell I was pregnant. The material is so soft and breathable. I also like the style- can be dressed up or down and perfect for the cold plane rides.
This set is great quality and super soft and comfortable.  I love it!  I want to buy it in more colors.

I love this outfit! I can’t say how it will hold up over time, but it seems high quality. The material feels very soft and comfortable. I would say that the material is medium thickness, warm enough to wear out and about shopping in the winter if you don’t live in a really cold climate. Definitely appropriate for the fall too.  It seems to be made a little oversized in a good, modern way. The pants are fitted at the waist and hips but flare out at the bottom. The top sits just below the waist line, short enough to have that modern feel but not so short that your stomach is exposed when you raise your arms. My only negative is that the top I ordered doesn’t have pockets. However, the description doesn’t claim that it has pockets, I guess I just assumed that it would.
